meanings.definition: Persons who share first place in a competition.
meanings.sent1: The cowinners of the spelling bee were excited to receive their trophies.
meanings.sent2: The two friends became cowinners of the art contest.
meanings.sent3: At the talent show, the cowinners celebrated their joint victory with a high-five.
meanings.sent4: The cowinners stood proudly on the podium, basking in their shared glory.
meanings.sent5: The cowinners' names were engraved on the championship plaque for all to see.

meanings.definition: To share first place in a competition with another person.
meanings.sent1: They cowinners the cooking competition by creating a delicious dish together.
meanings.sent2: In the race, they cowinners the finish line, crossing it hand in hand.
meanings.sent3: The siblings decided to cowinners the dance-off to surprise everyone.
meanings.sent4: The team managed to cowinners the championship, showcasing their exceptional teamwork.
